Welcome to the Ibis project!

- **Learning Ibis for the first time?:** Check out the [Ibis getting started tutorial](./tutorials/getting_started.qmd)!
- **Coming from SQL?**: Take a look at [Ibis for SQL users](./tutorials/ibis-for-sql-users.qmd)!
- **Coming from pandas?**: Check out [Ibis for pandas users](./tutorials/ibis-for-pandas-users.qmd)!
- **Coming from R?**: See [Ibis for dplyr users](./tutorials/ibis-for-dplyr-users.qmd)!
- **Want to see some more examples?**: We've got [a repository of examples](https://github.com/ibis-project/ibis-examples) for that!
